property.name: Text
property.value: When this defends against a Car, Truck, or tank, and you flip at least [B] -> This gets +1 [DEF] until end of battle for each [B] you flipped.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this defends -> You may play an Armor onto her.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Your opponent separates those cards into 2 piles. Put 1 pile into your hand and the other under this face down.

property.name: Text
property.value: This has +1 [ATK] for each card under him.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Look at the top card of your deck. If it's an Upgrade, you may play it.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks and you flip at least one Upgrade -> You may put one of the Upgrades you flipped into your hand after the battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks and your opponent has 3 or more Actions in their KO area -> This gets +3 [ATK] until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Look at your opponent's hand and put an Action from it into their KO area.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Move 1 damage counter from this to an enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play a [K] card -> Do 1 damage to an enemy and 1 damage to this.

property.name: Text
property.value: Tough 1. When one of your Wreckers takes 1 or more damage during your turn -> It gets that much +Attack until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> You may scrap a [B] card from your hand. If you do, scrap an enemy Upgrade.

property.name: Text
property.value: Whie this is attacking an Autobot -> This has Pierce 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an enemy that has fewer Stars than this becomes tapped -> Do 1 damage to that enemy. When an enemy that has more Stars than this becomes tapped -> Do 1 damage to this.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> This gets Pierce 3 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Your opponent chooses one of their characters and does 1 damage to it. If you flipped this character at least 2 times this turn, instead do 1 damage to each enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> You may scrap a [G] card from your hand. If you do, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this battles -> Instead of swapping a card from your hand with one of your flipped [G] cards after the battle, you may put one of those [G] cards into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Move an Upgrade from an enemy to another enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Return an Upgrade on an enemy to its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an enemy takes non-attack damage -> It gets -1 [DEF] until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks an enemy that has more Stars than him and you flip battle cards -> This gets Pierce 1 until end of battle for each different color among battle icons you flipped.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this defends an enemy that has more Stars than him and you flip battle cards -> This gets +1 [DEF] until end of battle for each different color among battle icons you flipped.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> One of your characters gets +1 [ATK] until end of turn. If it shares a trait with this, it gets +2 [ATK] until end of turn instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks -> Do 1 damage to an enemy that isn't a Car or Plane.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks -> If you had at least 2 Planes on your starting team, move 2 damage counters from this to the defender. Otherwise, move 1 damage counter from this to the defender.

property.name: Text
property.value: When one of your other characters attacks -> You may move 1 damage counter from it to this.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Draw a card. This has +1 [DEF] for each card under him.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an Upgrade is scrapped from this -> Put it under him.

property.name: Text
property.value: This starts the game with a Plane, or Helicopter under it that costs 4 Stars or fewer. When this attacks, combines, or is KO'd -> Deploy the character under it to the battlefield in alt mode. If this is attacking you get an extra attack this turn, but only with the deployed character.

property.name: Text
property.value: This starts the game with a Car, Tank, or Truck under it that costs 4 Stars or fewer. When this attacks, combines, or is KO'd -> Deploy the character under it to the battlefield in alt mode. If this is attacking you get an extra attack this turn, but only with the deployed character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Stealth. When your second character is KO'd this game and you had Tidal Wave, Dark Fleet (Aircraft Carrier) and Tidal Wave, Dark Fleet (Transport) on your starting team -> Combine them with this into Tidal Wave, Dark Fleet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Bold 2. Tough 2. When this is combined -> Do 3 damage to an enemy Autobot.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this is combined -> Tap an enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: While your Tracks, Autobot Warrior is in alt mode -> He has the Plane trait.

card.name: Better Things To Do Than Die

property.name: Text
property.value: When your Springer, Aerial Defense is on the battlefield and you flip him to another mode -> Repair 1 damage from him.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Windblade, Combiner Hunter has +1 [DEF] and +1 [HEALTH].

property.name: Text
property.value: When your Volcanicus, Fiery Champion attacks an enemy that has fewer Stars than him -> Your Volcanicus gets Bold until end of battle equal to the Star difference.

property.name: Text
property.value: When your Bludgeon, Electric Warrior attacks and you don't flip a battle card that has more than 1 battle icon -> Put one of the cards you flipped into your hand after the battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per game, when one of your Weaponizers in Upgrade mode is put into your KO area -> Return it to the battlefield upgrading one of your characters. Flip this.

property.name: Text
property.value: Replace the text '12 Stars or fewer' on your Autobot Cosmos, Recon & Communication with '21 Stars or fewer.'

property.name: Text
property.value: When your Brawn, Demolitions defends -> He gets +1 [DEF] until end of battle equal to the attacker's Bold total.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have Autobot Gears, Transport & Reconnaissance on the battlefield -> Enemies being upgraded can't cause abilities of your opponent's cards to trigger.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per game, when you flip your Windsweeper, Air Defense to alt mode and he has a number of damage counters equal to or greater than the number of enemies on the battlefield -> Move 1 damage counter from him to each enemy. Flip this.

property.name: Text
property.value: When your Sky Shadow (Tank) or Sky Shadow (Plane) is KO'd and you have Ominus outside the game -> Combine them into Sky Shadow, Elite Warrior with Ominus in head mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per game, when you flip one of your characters that has a character on it in head mode -> You may swap that head with one of your other character's heads. When you do, flip this.

property.name: Text
property.value: When your Sergeant Kup, Veteran Sergeant is upgraded with a Weapon, an Armor, and a Utility, and he does enough attack damage to KO a defender -> Untap him.

property.name: Text
property.value: Until end of turn -> Each [B] either player flips during a battle is a [O] instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you put this on a Decepticon -> Your opponent reveals their hand, chooses an Autobot card from it, and scraps that card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you deploy the upgraded character's head -> Put this and any other Upgrades that were on the upgraded character onto the deployed character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Pierce 3. When the upgraded character attacks -> Scrap this card after the battle.
